manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Lipikar: Lipikar is a line of prebiotic body moisturizers recommended by dermatologist worldwide. The Lipikar products address the needs of dry, extra dry, and eczema prone skin with formulas that are paraben-free, fragrance-free, and allergy-tested. Lipikar Soothing Relief Eczema Cream for Eczema-Prone Body, Hands and Face Product Technology *The #1 Body Care Brand in European Pharmacies. Lipikar Eczema Cream is a targeted treatment for itching and skin irritation due to eczema. This moisturizing body cream replenishes skin’s essential lipids and provides instant and long-lasting hydration. *Based on data provided by QuintilesIMS, Pharmatrend International in Europe. 2016 and YTD April 2017 data. ** Validated by La Roche-Posay, 2019. Accepted by the National Eczema Association* Dermatologist and Pediatrician Tested** Paraben-free** Fragrance-free** Steroid-free** Non-comedogenic** Allergy-tested** Suitable for Sensitive Skin**

Formulation This eczema cream is formulated with a high concentration of La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water and Aqua Posae Filiformis in a soothing, non-greasy formula that is clinically shown to relieve itchy, irritated skin and reduce the signs of eczema. It is also formulated with: - 1% Colloidal Oatmeal protects and helps relieve skin irritation and itching due to eczema. - Shea Butter & Glycerin: moisturizing agents that naturally attract water to skin. - Niacinamide: a form of vitamin B3 with soothing properties. How to Use Apply this eczema cream treatment to any areas prone to eczema of the body or face such as elbows, knees, or hands. This body moisturizer can be applied all over the body if needed. Gently massage product on skin until absorbed. Dermatological Expertise La Roche-Posay is committed to making dermatological skin care accessible to those who need it, by partnering with dermatologists from the development to the recommendation of our skin care products. We are committed to offering highly effective products that can be tolerated by even sensitive skin. Accepted by the National Eczema Association Lipikar Eczema Cream has been accepted by The National Eczema Association after a thorough review of its ingredients and its safety efficacy studies. The National Eczema Association is a non-profit organization with a mission to improve the health and quality of life for individuals with eczema through research, support, and education.

Replenishes skin’s essential lipids and provides long-lasting 48 hour hydration. Daily relief for dry to very dry skin. Gently cleanses body and face. Provides 24 hour hydration starting in the shower. Safe for the whole family’s sensitive skin. Mineral-rich micro-droplets provide immediate, intense soothing. Ideal for skin prone to burning, Oxybenzone-Free, UVA/UVB Protection, Oil-Free, Paraben-Free. Leaves skin hydrated with velvety texture Key Ingredients 1% Colloidal oatmeal skin protectant, La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water, Aqua Posae Filiformis, Shea Butter, Glycerin, Niacinamide La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water, Shea Butter, Glycerin, Niacinamide La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water, Aqua Posae Filiformis, Shea Butter, Glycerin, Niacinamide La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water, Shea Butter, & Niacinamide Thermal Spring Water Cell-Ox Shield Technology + Antioxidant Protection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Use on my face as that is where it is needed most. Product is nice and creamy and delivers relieve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eczema Soothing Relief Cream
reviews.reviewText: "Eczema Soothing Relief Cream"---finally, a product that does exactly what the name says it does!This is a long but thorough review that I hope may be helpful to fellow eczema sufferers:I have eczema flares on my hands which always get worse in the winter. I've been struggling to find a product that will relieve the itch and the scaly patches without making my hands slippery and greasy. I've applied this product only twice since I received it, but based on my extensive experience with other eczema products, this one is a winner! It has a great texture and soaks in quickly, but best if all it relieves the itch very shortly after I apply it. The red scaly patches on my hands are already disappearing and my skin is left soft as a baby's cheeks!It is fragrance free, but does have a very very faint petroleum-like smell after it is applied to the skin, but dissipates quickly.This is just something I observed that's not a big deal to me, but may be something to consider for someone else wanting to try this product.I would definitely recommend this product, as it is effective AND affordable, and as a bonus, it is FSA/HSA eligible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best hand cream I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: This is the best hand cream I have ever used.I am very sensitive to smell, and this is all but odorless. I love that.But it's also the best hand cream as far as moisture, absorption, and softness.I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing, but not a flare up fixer
reviews.reviewText: I gave La Roche-Posay's eczema cream a shot for my eczema flare-ups, and here's the real deal: it's great for moisturizing but didn't quite hit the mark for my flare-ups. It kept my skin feeling soft and hydrated, sure, but when it came to the main event - tackling those pesky flare-ups on my face - it just didn't stand up to the task. I had to switch back to my trusty cortisone, which honestly did a way better job.I ended up using this cream more as a general body moisturizer. It's okay for that, but if you're looking for something to combat serious flare-ups, this might not be your hero product.And about the tube - it's kind of a pain to squeeze out the last bits of the cream. It's like you know there's more in there, but good luck getting it out! A little redesign could go a long way in making sure you can use up every last drop.Overall, it's a decent moisturizer, but for those tough eczema moments, you might want to keep looking. And a little tweak in the tube design wouldn't hurt, either!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this cream! Rich texture but feels light on the skin. Helped my skin clear up and provides the perfect amount of hydration. Would recommend to anyone with sensitive/combination skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such a good lotion. Not greasy and leaves my hands feeling so smooth. Wish I tried this sooner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very healing and pleasant on all the senses
reviews.reviewText: Actually works!DISCLAIMER: I have only tried this on my hands.It feels light but penetrating, like actually leaves a nice smooth layer. Light pleasant scent.Feels "luxurious", which might sound weird to describe a lotion, but other lotions often feel goopy and cheap.This is the most expensive lotion in the category that I saw but I am totally happy with the overall value. I also liked the one by Aveeno, but that one had a little stickier feel. I will likely buy this one again as it has been the most effective for my eczema.The marketing for this company is questionable (they exagerate too much), but the science seems spot on. This was not even recommended to me by my dermatologist, and considering the expensive city he is in (Newport Beach, CA) he would likely not have a problem recommending something expensive. He gave me a bunch of samples of other lotions, they were decent overall at best, the one by Aveeno was the one that left the softest skin and smelled best. But i found this one on my own and happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product, helped my skin so much.
reviews.reviewText: Loved it. Used it for my face dry skin .

Compré este producto porque mi Bebé tenía mucha comezón en su piel y tenía zonas de irritación y otras con aspereza. Su piel siempre ha sido delicada y de tendencia atópica. Esta crema le quitó las zonas asperas que eran persistentes. Complementa ideal con Lipikar Baume AP. Son distintas. Esta crema de avena tiene una consistencia muy suave y eliminó las asperezas y comezón. También le ayudó a mi bebé cuando tuvo urticaria alimenticia.

Tengo piel extremadamente seca, este producto es bueno, lo utilizo en mi cara debido a que he tenido resequedad extrema y me ha ayudado. Aún tengo que poner otra crema porque por si sola, no me da suficiente hidratación pero ayuda mucho. La recomiendo.
Es de buena calidad y si hidrata, más es un poquito grasosa así que tarda un poco en que la piel lo absorba. Llegó en buen estado y a tiempo.
Llegó muy bien, nuevo y sellado
